title: 39b06 - Members of the military.
text:
The U.S. military is not
a covered employer under the FMLA and therefore military members are not
entitled to take leave under the FMLA.  However, civilian employees of the
military departments are considered employees of a public agency. 29 CFR 825.102
html:
